item.title: Covid Alberta
item.description: This is a small package that I have developed to look at some of the alberta specific covid data. There are two parts to the package.

item.title: Prospectivity Predictor
item.description: prospectPredictor This is a simple prospectivity prediction package that predicts the prospectivity of an element based on how close it is to different bedrock units.

item.title: pygeostat
item.description: pygeostat is a Python 3.6 module for geostatistical modeling. pygeostat is aimed at preparing spatial data, scripting geostatistical workflows, modeling using tools developed at the Centre for Computational Geostatistics, and constructing visualizations to communicate spatial data.

item.title: Python Examples
item.description: This is a collection of random notebooks where I am posting examples either for my posts or as reminders to myself on how to do something.

item.title: Yeg Census by Neighbourhoods
item.description: Edmonton Census Insights by Neighbourhood Project Goals Look at the 2016 census data for Edmonton neighborhoods to try to glean insights into the economic distribution of YEG residents.
